PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: To determine the actual ratio between DPP and TPD in the random terpolymers , they were characterized by 1H NMR spectroscopy and elemental analysis.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| DPP (Dissolution Polymer Partition) |
| TPD (Total Polymer Dissolved) |
| 1H NMR spectroscopy |
| Elemental analysis |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| DPP (Dissolution Polymer Partition) |
| TPD (Total Polymer Dissolved) |
| 1H NMR spectroscopy (used for characterization) |
| Elemental analysis (used for characterization) |

Note: In this context, "characterization" can be considered a process used to determine material properties. Therefore, 1H NMR spectroscopy and elemental analysis are considered material properties as they provide information about the composition and structure of the polymers.
